title: Luxurious and spacious country farm house suite, overlooking a pond
posting_body: Luxurious and spacious, Early American Farm house suite, overlooking a cute, little pond, in a picturesque country location.
This is a very private, unique and especially elegant, unfurnished one-bedroom farm house apartment, on the Merrimac, MA line.
This countrified rental suite, is not to be confused with either an apartment complex or a condo development.

The monthly rent will only be $1495, which includes some utilities, but you will be responsible for a few of the basic utilities which are considered to be normal, efficient, reasonable and personally cost controllable.

As you can see, this is a lovely, private, country farm house estate, which is ideally located in a spectacularly safe and very quiet neighborhood, conveniently located to Interstates I-95 and I-495, public transportation.
Additionally, it is close to several major roadways, popular shopping destinations, gorgeous beaches, etc.
Yet, it is elegantly quite, refreshingly safe and exquisitely exclusive with ample on-site acreage which allows you to enjoy elegant living with convenient off-street parking.

Obviously, this is what makes this a rare rental opportunity, especially for the responsible person, who seeks to enjoy the comfort of a luxurious, quiet and picturesque surroundings, in a neighborhood where you can enjoy private, outdoor relaxation.
References and security deposit are required.
Additional images and information is available upon request.
Also, be sure to include your specific needs, wants and preferential requirements, along with your ten-digit morning phone no.
